task.title: Operating the Hand Lever
task.shortdesc: Proper positioning and use of the hand lever for clutch control and vehicle safety.

prereq.p: Familiarize yourself with the hand lever's location and its multiple functions.

step.cmd: Positioning during engine cranking or vehicle at rest
step.stepxmp: Pull the hand lever back as far as it will go
step.info: This position holds the clutch in neutral, engages the emergency brake on rear wheels, and prevents car from moving during engine start.

step.stepxmp: Move hand lever to vertical position
step.info: Ensures no brake engagement while backing up
Required when driving in high or low speed

result.p: Correct hand lever positioning ensures safe and proper vehicle operation.
